remarks.para: May be inoperative (and APU used) provided:

numlitem.para: APU oil quantity is filled to capacity,
After five flight days, APU oil quantity is again filled to capacity, and
There is no evidence of above normal oil consumption or leakage.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "APU OIL QTY INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Ensure APU oil is filled to capacity.
Ensure APU oil is again filled to capacity after five (5) flight days.
Ensure there is no history of abnormal APU oil consumption and visually inspect the aft fuselage around the APU area for evidence of oil leakage.
